title: Attempting to login to league fails 9/10 times and i am getting the firewall error again help me
body: After the patch 9 times out of 10 it fails to login and when i finally do login i can't connect to chat i have no summoner icon for draft lobby [Picture here] http://imgur.com/a/OthCQ (probably due to the fact that i can't connect to chat at all), i tried queuing up for a game, and didn't even get to the loading screen "please check your firewall settings" i have tried all of the things on the troubleshoot connection problems page. Help me!

replies.body:
I see you're on a WiFi connection, which could be causing issues with your connection's stability to the server. Since you've already tried all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you grab a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will expedite your service. Let me know if you have any questions.
